name: One Touch Drawing — connect dots with one stroke, puzzle game
name_original: One Touch Drawing — connect dots with one stroke, puzzle game
description:
A puzzle game with gorgeous lighting and shading in science and technology style. Simple controlling which gives you an intelligence test while killing the time. You won't get bored before you pass the 265 creative and amazing levels.
The only thing you need to do is to click the centre of every halo to link the lines, but alight lines can not be linked again. Lighten all the lines to make the next level.



Game Feature
visual effects in science and technology style
great design with attractive light and sound effects
265 different amazing levels !
pay nothing to enjoy such a cool game
